■Stop when the buzzer sounds
for the second time. Then,
open the cover and egg rings
in order right away.

■Remove using the egg turner
and place on the UHC tray.
■You can place up to 18 eggs
on the UHC tray (3 columns,
6 rows).

■Be sure to heat the egg until
the yolk is gel-like and does
not flow.
■The eggs will be moist, but
you should heat them until
there are no soft parts left.

■Prepare the eggs so that the
edges don't break and it 
doesn't move around.
